channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.9
item.description:
What's New

Fix macro special characters handling and improve window title rules

  • Add comprehensive special character support for macros
  • Update KeyboardEventHandler to properly handle special chars in macroKey buffer
  • Enhance MacroManager with detailed logging for debugging
  • Improve AppBehaviorDetector with better Firefox and Google Docs detection
  • Add comprehensive VNI unit tests
  • Update WindowTitleRulesView UI for better rule management
  • Version 1.2.9

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
